description.en: At present, online traffic tends to be saturated, but the value of offline traffic portals becomes prominent, and the value of a large number of offline scenarios is to be tapped. X-power Chain has cooperated with tens of thousands of companies in the world and displayed more than 400,000 offline screen terminals, which have generated more than 70,000 nodes and a daily traffic of over 10 million and provided a lot of traffic for the development of public scenario. X-power Chain energizes “public screen” from Blockchain Advertising, Blockchain Content and Blockchain DAPP and creates a public open platform for global users to explore, tap and exploit its potential value.
